document_data.name: Lammasu
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lammasu language''' was the racial language of [[lammasu]]s.
document_data.Speakers: Beyond lammasus themselves, Lammasu was a common secondary language among [[shedim]].<ref>

Dictionary.Unknown Words: The Lammasu tongue included a word for "juicy steak".<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Twilight of the Dirty Turtles|8}}<ref group="note" name="word">What exactly this word is was never stated within the cited text.
